-MaJkucgRWsSeYrzrefY.title: Sorting Hat
-MaJkucgRWsSeYrzrefY.description: The purpose of this project was to use Javascript to create a one-page app that would randomly sort you into a Hogwarts House. It also required the ability to delete, or expel, the student and put them into a new category. The focus of the project was getting comfortable with arrays and objects.
-MaJkucgRWsSeYrzrefY.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, Vanilla JavaScript, Version Control with Github
